reviews.review: Story is better than in most games today. The game is linear, but in a way that makes sense and adds to the experience. The most enjoyable part of the game are the physics puzzles that the player encounters throughout the journey. There are lots of small details that make this game memorable.

Well he's had his ups, he's had his downs, he's had his crowbars, he's had his frowns but I still say he should be crowned.......The King of Steam!

What more can a poor boy do working on a store for me and you, what more can a poor boy say but I could use your points in any way!

Arrrghh!! He had to face The wrath of fans but at least he kept his chubby hands, I think we should be crowning hims......The King of Steam!

We've all had fun you must agree even though interactively, but now we feel that Gaben should be.....The King of Steam!

This game is one of my favorite story games that I have ever played. Half Life 2 at its time was way ahead of every game in the industry. The writing and the story telling still lives up to this day and age. Very enjoyable game. Very re playable. 10/10

This game is so f*cking good. Everything about it makes me belive that this game was released sometimes in 2011 and not in 2004. Do I really have to tell you what Half-Life 2 is? That it's an FPS by Valve Software? No? I didn't think so.

This isn't a classic for nothing. It has great, innovative gameplay, fun physics, an intrigueing universe, great pacing, an interesting story, awesome setpieces, insane attention to detail, a fluid, believable progression and a beefy playtime for a shooter, all that. It has.

Yes, after years of watching Gmod videos, the game may look bland looking at screenshots or gameplay footage. I've seen all of the models, props and textures before too, but it all just comes together when you're actually playing Half-Life 2.

It's hard to describe this game with words. Just give it a shot. It's cheap anyway.

10/10 - An FPS masterpiece.

Помню те времена когда ме достался диск с gta vice и stalker chadow of chernobyl, да и это лицензионые от 1с, в те времена люди не так часто ими пользовались. помню ещё как в farcry 1 играл на древнем пк. Я к чему все это. Дело в том, что я пропустил серию half-life ни в 1, ни во 2 часть я так и не поиграл. И вы будете удивлены но взял я 2 часть только в 2020 на распродаже. Итог я просто был в шоке, как  деградировали современные игры которые выходят сегодня. Если кто не играл, то бегите. 2004 год это не приговор. Графика, физика, даже на сегодняшний день выглядит неплохо.
